courses.title: Student Teaching Secondary or All-Level
courses.prerequisite: Admission to the CEP Educator Preparation Program and Admission to CEP Clinical Teaching.
courses.notes: All Education courses must be taken prior to admission to Clinical Teaching. Passing identified TExES certification exams is required before EDUC 4611. Must be taken last semester. Only offered Fall or Spring.
